plot: Desperately seeking emotional stability from his mentally ill mother and emotionally withdrawn father, Danilo is pushed to boiling point when he is taunted by a school bully.
title: Danilo
plot_es: Desperately seeking emotional stability from his mentally ill mother and emotionally withdrawn father, Danilo is pushed to boiling point when he is taunted by a school bully.
plot_en: Desperately seeking emotional stability from his mentally ill mother and emotionally withdrawn father, Danilo is pushed to boiling point when he is taunted by a school bully.
